body: Hi my name is long u can call me urnot xD. This server was actually the first server i played on back when i first got minecraft in 1.5. This server was called differently i think and from what i remember it only had Nexus, Hunger Games, Nebula and Walls so after a LONG time i decided to join the community here :D. Anyway looking forward to being more active with the avicus server!
